description:
A time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects.


- (Improvement) The 'Continue' button has been returned to the time entry card.
- (Fix) In-app update no longer triggers a system reboot.
- (Fix) Fixed an issue where screenshots were not being recorded.
- (Fix) Resolved app crashes when a user adds a task to the project.
- (Fix) The app no longer shows an unusual dark color upon launch.
- (Fix) 'No project yet' text is now clickable.
